name: Psychedelic Switch
description:
-PSYCHEDELIC SWITCH-

A simply trippy challenge to get a new high score!

tap your way through the same colored wall as your player, each successful pass will give you a point towards your high score.
Just try not to tripp out ;)


Things to look forward to:
-the game, duh!
-upcoming game modes
-a series of different psychedelic backgrounds to play with
-a simply trippy experience :)
